name: Mobile Dino
overview:
Increase customers to you by converting traditional websites into mobile friendly websites. Make your website easy to navigate on small screens, ie; smartphones, tablets, games, etc. It is what customers expect when surfing on their smartphones and small devices. A good experience of your website on their small device will keep them coming back to you, a bad experience and they will go to your competition.

Mobile Dino is a national company based in the heart of America in Lincoln, Nebraska. It is easy for your business to have an affordable and dynamic mobile solution. You no longer need to pay $30,000 to have an app that is continually costly, time consuming, and diffiicult to update.

If you like hands on you can use the client controll panel or become a reseller yourself and make it and update it yourself, “it’s so easy a 5th grader could mobile it” technology powers you from start to finish! Update your mobile website anytime and anywhere 24/7.

Is it time to consider an awesome mobile website that looks and feels like an app that will impress your customers?
